articles.author: Mark Healy, Andrew Thompson
articles.title: The United States of Automobiles - Business Insider
articles.description: We created an interactive road map of what America drives. Find out where your car is most popular — and which rides your neighbors love most.
articles.content: "More than any other country," Lyndon B. Johnson once said of America, "ours is an automobile society." He wasn't exaggerating: Americans own more cars per capita than the citizens of any other natio… [+2306 chars]
